name: unless
posTip: A word used to join parts of a phrase or sentence.

example.eg: You can't get a job unless you have experience (= you can only get a job if you have experience).
example.egtrans: 除非有工作经验，否则你找不到工作。

example.eg: Unless you call me to say you're not coming, I'll see you at the theatre (= I will see you there if you do not call to say you are not coming).
example.egtrans: 除非你打电话说你不来了，否则我就在剧院等你。
